entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 10:19 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

Temperature: 7.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches inland in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
